about_the_game:
Delve into an unsettling dark fantasy world from the perspective of three haphazard adventurers lost in a cave. The titular protagonist, Badgersaw, took a wrong turn and now these three have no way back, it’s up to him to lead the way out of this mess.

He is joined by his two companions, the wizard Mr L (who denies the existence of Magic) and the ranger Tantalum (Badgersaw’s betwixt friend).

The dungeon is inhabited by its own cast of bizarre creatures, talk to them, learn a little about what’s going on, maybe convince them to help you out.


The combat requires to player to synergize the strengths of the three party members, who each have their own resource in lieu of traditional MP with different rules for each character. There is no simple way to restore HP, so the player will have to think about the long haul through the dungeon if they hope to uncover everything.

Eventually, the party will unlock items, equipment and new abilities to allow players to customize the protagonist's combat roles and develop a unique play style.

Proceed with caution, as death is everywhere. Each death also gives you a unique scene, so you can have fun dying, too.

  • Completely hand illustrated

  • Dark world rich with lore

  • Unique protagonists with different strengths

  • Turn-Based synergistic combat system

  • Secret bosses and hidden content

  • An unrelenting stream of protagonist banter

  • Original Soundtrack capturing the peculiar atmosphere

content_descriptors.notes: The Adventures of Badgersaw frequently makes use of dark topics for comedic effect, including Torture, Amputation and Alcohol and Drug use.

short_description: Brave the bizarre in this unique horror-comedy adventure set in a cavern full of schizo tech and nightmarish creatures. The adventurer Badgersaw and his two companions are lost and must find their way out, but end up unwittingly unravelling a web of ancient secrets.
